trans-unit.source: Represents an issuer name registry that maintains a list of trusted issuers loaded from elements in the application configuration file that associate each issuer name to the X.509 certificate that is needed to verify the signature of tokens produced by the issuer.
trans-unit.target: 表示保留的应用程序配置文件中将验证由颁发者的令牌的签名时需要的 X.509 证书对每个颁发者名称相关联的元素从加载的受信任颁发者列表颁发者名称注册表。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Adds an issuer to the dictionary of trusted issuers.
trans-unit.target: 将颁发者添加到受信任的颁发者的字典。

trans-unit.source: You can call this method to add issuers to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.ConfiguredTrustedIssuers%2A> dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 你可以调用此方法可添加到的颁发者<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.ConfiguredTrustedIssuers%2A>字典。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.ConfiguredTrustedIssuers%2A>

trans-unit.source: In derived classes, you can call this method from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.LoadCustomConfiguration%2A> method to add issuers to the dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中，你可以调用此方法从<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.LoadCustomConfiguration%2A>方法将颁发者添加到字典。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.LoadCustomConfiguration%2A>

trans-unit.source: ASN.1 encoded form of the issuer's certificate thumbprint.
trans-unit.target: ASN.1 编码形式的颁发者的证书指纹。

trans-unit.source: The name of the issuer.
trans-unit.target: 颁发者的名称。

trans-unit.source: certificateThumbprint is or empty.
trans-unit.target: certificateThumbprint是或为空。

trans-unit.source: -or- name is or empty.
trans-unit.target: -or- name is or empty.

trans-unit.source: The issuer specified by certificateThumbprint has already been configured.
trans-unit.target: 指定的颁发者 certificateThumbprint 已配置。

trans-unit.source: (The issuer already exists in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.ConfiguredTrustedIssuers*> dictionary.)
trans-unit.target: (中已存在的颁发者<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.ConfiguredTrustedIssuers*>字典。)</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.ConfiguredTrustedIssuers*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the dictionary of trusted issuers that have been configured for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取此实例已配置的受信任颁发者的字典。

trans-unit.source: The key to the dictionary is the ASN.1 encoded form of the thumbprint of the trusted issuer's certificate and the value is the issuer name.
trans-unit.target: 字典的关键是指纹的证书的 ASN.1 编码形式的受信任颁发者，值为颁发者名称。

trans-unit.source: The dictionary contains the issuers that were specified in configuration and any additional issuers that have been added with the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.AddTrustedIssuer%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 字典包含已在配置中指定的颁发者和已添加了任何其他颁发者<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.AddTrustedIssuer%2A>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.AddTrustedIssuer%2A>

trans-unit.source: A dictionary that contains the trusted issuers.
trans-unit.target: 一个字典，其中包含受信任的颁发者。

trans-unit.source: Returns the issuer name associated with the specified <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken"></xref> by mapping the certificate thumbprint to a name in the trusted issuers dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 返回与指定关联的颁发者名称<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken"></xref>通过将证书指纹映射到受信任颁发者字典中的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation searches the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.ConfiguredTrustedIssuers%2A> dictionary for the thumbprint of the X.509 certificate specified in `securityToken`.
trans-unit.target: 默认实现搜索<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.ConfiguredTrustedIssuers%2A>中指定的 X.509 证书的指纹的字典`securityToken`。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.ConfiguredTrustedIssuers%2A>

trans-unit.source: If an entry is found, the issuer name is returned; otherwise, `null` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到相应的项，则返回的颁发者名称否则为`null`返回。

trans-unit.source: If `securityToken` is not assignable from <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>, `null` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`securityToken`不可从<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>，`null`返回。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: The security token for which the issuer name is requested.
trans-unit.target: 安全令牌为其请求的颁发者名称。

trans-unit.source: Should be assignable as <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 应是可赋值的作为<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.X509SecurityToken"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The issuer name if an entry for the certificate thumbprint of the token exists in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.ConfiguredTrustedIssuers*> dictionary; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果该令牌的证书指纹的条目中存在的颁发者名称<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.ConfiguredTrustedIssuers*>字典; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.ConfigurationBasedIssuerNameRegistry.ConfiguredTrustedIssuers*>

trans-unit.source: securityToken is .
trans-unit.target: securityTokenis .

trans-unit.source: Loads the trusted issuers from configuration.
trans-unit.target: 从配置中加载的受信任的颁发者。

trans-unit.source: The XML that represents the map of trusted issuers that is specified in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 表示配置文件中指定的受信任颁发者映射的 XML。

trans-unit.source: customConfiguration is .
trans-unit.target: customConfigurationis .

trans-unit.source: The configuration contains one or more elements that are not recognized.
trans-unit.target: 配置包含无法识别的一个或多个元素。
